title: Suddenly last summer
creator_credit: Joseph L Mankiewicz, Sam Spiegel and Columbia Pictures
brief_description: From a Tennessee Williams play, an outrageous, melodramatic piece touching on madness, homosexual prostitution, incest, disease and cannibalism. Stars Elizabeth Taylor, Katherine Hepburn, Montgomery Clift. Adapted for the screen by Gore Vidal.
